response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the effort put into its creation. I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or serve a purpose that would justify its cost for you. Considering its worth and potential benefits, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,500. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 11500}
